executives.name: Julie Mercer-Ingram
executives.customer_note: Julie Mercer-Ingram is the co-founder and CEO of Proof Operations, Inc. She previously served as the creative director while also working as a cannabis attorney.

executives.name: Matthew Ingram
executives.customer_note: Matthew Ingram is the co-founder and CEO of Proof Operations, Inc.

executives.name: Sarah Hines
executives.customer_note: Sarah Hines is the Chief Operating Officer of Proof Operations, Inc. She is an expert in safe and compliant cannabis manufacturing and distribution.

website_info.summary: Proof Operations, Inc. is a cannabis company that provides a variety of products including tinctures, drops, high THC shots, capsules, craft cocktail syrups, and branded swag. They focus on compassionate pricing and accessibility in the cannabis space.
website_info.infomration_about_the_team: Proof Operations, Inc. is co-founded by Julie Mercer-Ingram, who is the current CEO, and Matthew Ingram. Sarah Hines is the Chief Operating Officer. The company is women-owned and operated, with 80% of the team being women.
